title: Thurs Post Show (09-08-22)
itunes:title: Thurs Post Show (09-08-22)
description:
Bobby is in New York City and is trying to find the guy who spit on his wife last time. Bobby gives an update on 6 days of no sugar. We get an update from Morgan1 who is with Bobby in NYC about the attractive man who came to her house and she sent a flirty text to. Raymundo and Abby talk about their time in Vegas. Lunchbox pitches a segment if a random guy is better than Abby at singing.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
